org.realityforge.braincheck

Class BrainCheckTestUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.realityforge.braincheck.BrainCheckTestUtil

  • @GwtIncompatible
public final class BrainCheckTestUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for interacting with BrainCheck in tests.

      • setOnGuardListener

        public static void setOnGuardListener(@Nullable
                                      BrainCheckTestUtil.OnGuardListener onGuardListener)
        Specify a callback that is invoked anytime the Guards.invariant(Supplier, Supplier) method or the Guards.apiInvariant(Supplier, Supplier) method is invoked while in development mode.
        Parameters:
        onGuardListener - the listener.

      • resetConfig

        public static void resetConfig(boolean productionMode)
        Reset the state of BrainCheck config to either production or development state.
        Parameters:
        productionMode - true to set it to production mode configuration, false to set it to development mode config.
